solution_line_template: First find the total number of claws the cat has: {claws_per_foot} claws/foot * {num_feet} feet = <<{claws_per_foot}*{num_feet}={total_claws}>>{total_claws} claws
Then find the total time Nissa spends cutting the claws: {total_claws} claws * {time_per_claw} seconds/claw = <<{total_claws}*{time_per_claw}={time_clipping_claws}>>{time_clipping_claws} seconds
Then find the total time she spends cleaning the cats' ears: {time_per_ear} seconds/ear * {num_ears} ears = {time_cleaning_ears} seconds

Then find how long the shampooing takes in seconds: {shampoo_minutes} minutes * {seconds_per_minute} seconds/minute = <<{shampoo_minutes}*{seconds_per_minute}={time_shampooing_seconds}>>{time_shampooing_seconds} seconds

Then add the time she spends on each task to find the total time she spends grooming the cat: {time_clipping_claws} seconds + {time_cleaning_ears} seconds + {time_shampooing_seconds} seconds = <<{time_clipping_claws}+{time_cleaning_ears}+{time_shampooing_seconds}={total_grooming_time}>>{total_grooming_time} seconds
